values: To roast something is to cook it in an oven or over a fire.
Mom roasted a turkey for the holiday dinner.
n. 烤肉；烘烤 adj. 烘烤的；烤过的 vt. 烤，焙；烘，烘烤；暴露于某种热力下以得温暖 vi. 烤；烘
